Function 1: Allows you to get players by the name

```{r}
get_player <- function(name) {
  url <- paste0("https://www.balldontlie.io/api/v1/players?search=", name)
  httr::GET(url)$content |>
    rawToChar() |>
    jsonlite::fromJSON() |>
    purrr::pluck("data") |>
    tibble::as_tibble()
}
```

Function 3: Allows you to get names for a team and a date

```{r}
get_games <- function(team_id, date) {
  url <- paste0("https://www.balldontlie.io/api/v1/games?team_ids[]=", team_id, "&dates[]=", date)
  httr::GET(url)$content |>
    rawToChar() |>
    jsonlite::fromJSON() |>
    purrr::pluck("data") |>
    tibble::as_tibble()
}
```
